problem.markdown: What do you propose to do, in this course? ( ) I propose to browse the content – watch the videos, read the text, and answer the questions, but I do not plan to complete the course. ( ) I plan to complete some course activities, but I do not plan to earn a certificate. ( ) I am planning to complete enough course activities to earn a certificate. ( ) I have not decided whether I will complete any course activities.
problem.p: What do you propose to do, in this course?

choicegroup.choice: I propose to browse the content – watch the videos, read the text, and answer the questions, but I do not plan to complete the course.
I plan to complete some course activities, but I do not plan to earn a certificate.
I am planning to complete enough course activities to earn a certificate.
I have not decided whether I will complete any course activities.
